After infusing [[Kurama]]'s chakra into Naruto's [[Wind Release: Rasengan]], he fires it as a beam, which has enough power to clear an explosion,<ref>''Naruto: Shippūden'' episode 484</ref> or uses it to propel himself into the air.<ref>''The Last: Naruto the Movie''</ref>

== Trivia ==
* While unnamed in the anime and movie, this technique was named in ''[[Naruto: Shinobi Collection Shippū Ranbu]]''.
